column4: guys, I am looking for support for a problem that i have a year now! Yes, a year. The problem is a very slow computer. Upon reinstall, it is snappy and fast, but after a few months it becomes slower and slower. My specs are not bad, so it's not that. Somebody suggested that it could be X. Okay, so, maybe it is X. Can anyone please help me with this problem? Specs: CPU: AMD Athlon 2800+, Videocard: ATI Radeon 9250, RAM: 512MB, HDD: Maxtor
Can anyone help me with that one?
maybe it's too bloated, checked your free memory lately?
I tend not to use heavy programs like Azureus. Cos, like I said, i've been trying to solve this for years now
minimum 4%, but it is on 18% often
slow respond times, apps don't open as fast as they used to, firefox doesn't respond too fast, all actions go slow, like, you want to open a tab, and it opens a second afterwards.
It doesn't do what you want to do, on the time you want it do do what you want it to do.
yeah, that was easy to understand. :D. is it just firefox, or other apps also?
I installed Compiz yesterday, and I disabled it. BUT, it was slow BEFORE i installed Compiz. Just as slow.
try running, let say firefox, from the terminal, see what warnings and errors are hidden
